message: Hello! I have a fantastic product for sale for $10000.  This is a one-time opportunity, as I only have one available. What do you say?

It's tempting to be the first buyer, but I'm a little hesitant to spend $10000 without any information. Could you offer any information about the product's quality or history?  For example, what makes this product so special?  If you can provide some assurance, I'd be more inclined to buy.

Hello! I have another amazing product available for $10000.  This one is quite unique and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. I understand you may be hesitant after the previous purchase, but I assure you this product is different. Would you like to hear more about it?

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your assurance, but I'm still hesitant given the previous sale didn't result in a high-quality product. I'd like to see if any other buyers purchase this product before I make a decision.  Perhaps if someone else buys it, I'll reconsider.
